member.summary: Slice the array to create a new copy of new array.
member.typeparam: The type of objects in array.
member.param: An array that want to slice.
The start index to slice the array.
member.returns: A deep copy of elements from the specified start index until the last element from the array.
member.exception: - Start index can't be negative number and larger than arrray length. - Requested length can't exceed from remaining length of array after the start index.

member.summary: Slice the array to create a new copy of new array.

member.param: An array that want to slice.
The start index to slice the array.
A requested length of how many element to slice from the start index.
member.returns: A deep copy of elements between the specified start index and requested length.
member.exception: - Start index can't be negative number and larger than arrray length. - Requested length can't exceed from remaining length of array after the start index.
